testcase.name: getProductBySlug > throws a descriptive error when called with an empty slug

failure.message: expected [Function] to throw error including 'getProductBySlug called without a val…' but got 'NEXT_PUBLIC_WORDPRESS_GRAPHQL environ…'

testcase.failure:
